name: Party Pooper (Ludum Dare 40)
description:
The goal is simple: To drink as much alcohol as possible! But please do not poop yourself. Or at least try to.

This game was made for the 40th Ludum Dare Game Jam.

Developed by
- Simon Haag (Twitter)
- Patrick Tobler (Twitter)
- Peter Jaschkowske (Twitter)

Music by Fahim Popalzai
